title: ipi-pon
description: This module defines a data model for passive optical network(PON)    configuration which can include profiles, optical line terminal(OLT),    optical network unit(ONU) and flow

ipi-pon:pon.description: Top PON container for all PON controls and states.

config.description: configuration data for PON debug configuration

debug-options.description: Debugging enable configuration for PON functionalities
Debugging enable configuration for PON functionalities

terminal-debug-options.description: Indicate current terminal debugging state for the PON module

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other systems is from 0 to 65535

pon-type.description: The setting is supported by Zyxel SDA3016SS and Alpha Networks SPX70D0-168F OLTs only. The PON type setting is either combo-xgspon or single-gpon. The default is combo-xgspon. SDA3016SS OLT supports combo and xgspon in combo-xgspon type. SPX70D0-168F OLT only supports xgspon in combo-xgspon type

dhcp-one2one.description: The on or off state for DHCP relay function on the OLT. By default the relay is off for 1:1 flow mode

dhcp-n2one.description: The on or off state for DHCP relay function on the OLT. By default the relay is on for N:1 flow mode

pppoe.description: The on or off state for PPPoE relay function on the OLT. By default the relay is off

encryption.description: The on or off state of PON communication encryption for Tibit OLT. Default is off state

key-time.description: The encryption key exchange time in seconds for the PON communication. Default value is 60 seconds.

management-tpid.description: Either 802.1q TPID 0x8100 or 802.1ad TPID 0x88a8 to be used for OLT management.

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is from 0 to 65535

pon-type.description: The setting is supported by Zyxel SDA3016SS and Alpha Networks SPX70D0-168F OLTs only. The PON type setting is either combo-xgspon or single-gpon. The default is combo-xgspon. SDA3016SS OLT supports combo and xgspon in combo-xgspon type. SPX70D0-168F OLT only supports xgspon in combo-xgspon type

dhcp-one2one.description: The on or off state for DHCP relay function on the OLT. By default the relay is off for 1:1 flow mode

dhcp-n2one.description: The on or off state for DHCP relay function on the OLT. By default the relay is on for N:1 flow mode

pppoe.description: The on or off state for PPPoE relay function on the OLT. By default the relay is off

encryption.description: The on or off state of PON communication encryption for Tibit OLT. Default is off state

key-time.description: The encryption key exchange time in seconds for the PON communication. Default value is 60 seconds.

management-tpid.description: Either 802.1q TPID 0x8100 or 802.1ad TPID 0x88a8 to be used for OLT management.

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is from 0 to 65535

mapping.description: serial number mapping for the OLT

serial-number.description: The serial number i.e. MAC address for Tibit OLT
The serial number i.e. MAC address for Tibit OLT

enable-operations.description: The configuration to enable or disable OLT in auto or manual mode

enable-operation.description: The configuration to enable or disable OLT in auto or manual mode

provisioning-type.description: This is the ONU provisioning control on the OLT. OLT can configure and enable the discovered ONUs automatically or manually. The type can be manual or automatic

administrative-state.description: The enable or disable control for OLT. The value can either up or down

provisioning-type.description: This is the ONU provisioning control on the OLT. OLT can configure and enable the discovered ONUs automatically or manually. The type can be manual or automatic

administrative-state.description: The enable or disable control for OLT. The value can either up or down

provisioning-type.description: This is the ONU provisioning control on the OLT. OLT can configure and enable the discovered ONUs automatically or manually. The type can be manual or automatic

administrative-state.description: The enable or disable control for OLT. The value can either up or down

operational-status.description: This is to indicate the operational status of the OLT

product-name.description: Indicate the chip production name for the OLT

part-number.description: Indicate the chip part number for the OLT

serial-number.description: Indicate the chip serial number for the OLT

vendor.description: Indicate the chip verdor for the OLT

firmware-version.description: Indicate the chip firmware version for the OLT

revision.description: Indicate the chip revision for the OLT

temperature.description: Indicate the chip temperature in Celsius if multiple sensors unavailable

sensor-temperature.description: The OLT chip temperatures when multi-sensors available

temperature.description: Indicate the chip sensor temperature in Celsius

id.description: Indicate the firmware memory bank id for the OLT
Indicate the firmware memory bank id for the OLT

version.description: Indicate the firmware version for the OLT

sha.description: Indicate the firmware SHA signature for the OLT

active.description: Indicate whether the bank is active

next-activated.description: Indicate whether the bank will be activated for next reboot

rx-drop-packets.description: Indicate the interface ingress dropped packets

tx-drop-packets.description: Indicate the interface egress dropped packets

operational-down-reason.description: Indicate OLT interface operational down reason

fec.description: Indicate FEC status for the OLT NNI interface. Tibit has no such status

rx-drop-packets.description: Indicate the interface ingress dropped packets

tx-drop-packets.description: Indicate the interface egress dropped packets

operational-down-reason.description: Indicate OLT interface operational down reason

rogue-detect.description: Indicate ONU rogue detection status for the OLT PON interface

total.description: Indicate total PON bandwidth in Kbps for guaranteed traffic

cbr.description: Indicate total PON bandwidth in Kbps available for CBR real-time traffic

available.description: Indicate total PON bandwidth in Kbps available for guaranteed traffic after new ONU is added

pon-port-name.description: The PON port name to enable the rogue ONU detection. The port name should start with 'pon'
The PON port name to enable the rogue ONU detection. The port name should start with 'pon'

onu-id.description: This is the logical ONU identity in the system. The ONU identity is from 0 to 4095
This is the logical ONU identity in the system. The ONU identity is from 0 to 4095

administrative-state.description: The ONU lock/unlock control. This is identical to the ITU OMCI ONU-G administrative unlock/lock state. The administrative state can be either locked or unlocked. By default it's unlocked

encryption.description: The on or off state of PON communication encryption per ONU for non-Tibit OLT. By default encryption is off

us-fec.description: The on or off state of PON upstream FEC per ONU for non-Tibit OLT. Default value is on

onu-id.description: This is the logical ONU identity in the system. The ONU identity is from 0 to 4095

us-fec.description: The on or off state of PON upstream FEC per ONU for non-Tibit OLT. Default value is on

total-uni-ports.description: Indicate the total number of UNI ports supported by the ONU

upstream-priority-queues.description: Indicate the total number of upstream priority queues supported by the ONU

downstream-priority-queues.description: Indicate the total number of downstream priority queues supported by the ONU

pon-port-rx-power-level.description: The receive power level in dBm for the ONU at the PON port

upstream-encryption.description: Aggregated upstream encryption counters on the related PON port

pon-port-name.description: PON port name starting with 'pon' on which ONU will be presented

serial-number.description: ONU serial number which can be full hexadecimal string or staring with manufacturer alphabet ID

onu-profile-name.description: The ONU profile be applied to the ONU configuration. The predefined default_onu_profile is provided

uni-port-id.description: This is the UNI port ID in the ONU. The ID can be between 0 and 255 depending on the ONU UNI capability

config.description: configuration data for ONU UNI configuration

administrative-state.description: Control UNI port to be locked or unlocked. The value can be either lock or unlock.By default, the UNI port state is 'lock'

mtu.description: The size of maximum transmission unit for the UNI port. The size range is between 576 and 8986. Default size is 1518

dhcp.description: The on or off state for DHCP relay function on UNI port. By default the relay is on

trust.description: The on or off state for trusting UNI port. By default the state is off

flow-id.description: This is the subscriber flow identity in the system. The ID range is between 0 and 65535
This is the subscriber flow identity in the system. The ID range is between 0 and 65535

mode.description: This is the flow mode which can be 1:1 or N:1 VLAN model. It's 1:1 VLAN by default. The value can be either one2one or n2one

flow-id.description: This is the subscriber flow identity in the system. The ID range is between 0 and 65535

mode.description: This is the flow mode which can be 1:1 or N:1 VLAN model. It's 1:1 VLAN by default. The value can be either one2one or n2one

operational-status.description: Indicate the operational status of the flow

operational-down-reason.description: Indicate the reason when flow is down

ready-status.description: The attribute is to show flow setting ready status

It's to have flow QOS mode switch command for command terminal. Netconf will simply set the value as qos

vlan-tag.description: The VLAN ID presented on PON port, the ID ranges between 2 and 4094

uni-port-id.description: This is the UNI port ID in the ONU. The ID can be between 0 and 255 depending on the ONU UNI capability

vlan-tag.description: The VLAN ID presented on PON port, the ID ranges between 2 and 4094

translation-profile-name.description: The translation profile applied to the ONU UNI. The predefined default_translation_profile is provided as a choice

ether-type.description: Either 802.1q TPID 0x8100 or 802.1ad TPID 0x88a8 be used for the flow. The choice can be 0x8100 or 0x88a8

onu-id.description: This is the logical ONU identity in the system. The ONU identity is between 0 and 4095

uni-port-id.description: This is the UNI port ID in the ONU. The ID can be between 0 and 255 depending on the ONU UNI capability

vlan-tag.description: The VLAN ID presented on PON port, the ID ranges between 2 and 4094

translation-profile-name.description: The translation profile applied to the ONU UNI. The predefined default_translation_profile is provided as a choice

ether-type.description: Either 802.1q TPID 0x8100 or 802.1ad TPID 0x88a8 be used for the flow. The choice can be 0x8100 or 0x88a8

pon-transport-info.description: PON transport info for the flow

tcont-name.description: Indicate the T-CONT name for the flow

gem-port-name.description: Indicate the GEM port name for the flow

p-bits.description: Indicate IEEE 802.1p class of service associated to the GEM port

upstream-priority-queue.description: Indicate the UNI upstream priority queue number

downstream-priority-queue.description: Indicate the UNI downstream priority queue number

onu-me-info.description: ONU ME info for the flow

name.description: Indicate G.988 ONU managed entity class name
Indicate G.988 ONU managed entity class name

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

nni-port-name.description: The NNI port name starting with 'nni' for the flow

vlan-tag-value.description: The VLAN ID presented on NNI port, the ID string has 1 to 4 numeric digits. The ID string can be none or 2 to 4094

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

nni-port-name.description: The NNI port name starting with 'nni' for the flow

vlan-tag-value.description: The VLAN ID presented on NNI port, the ID string has 1 to 4 numeric digits. The ID string can be none or 2 to 4094

vlan-tag-format.description: The 802.1q TPID 0x8100 or 802.1ad TPID 0x88a8 presented in the NNI packet. The format may be set when vlan-tag-value is not 'none'. The input value can be either 0x8100 or 0x88a8

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

nni-port-name.description: The NNI port name starting with 'nni' for the flow

vlan-tag-value.description: The VLAN ID presented on NNI port, the ID string has 1 to 4 numeric digits. The ID string can be none or 2 to 4094

vlan-tag-format.description: The 802.1q TPID 0x8100 or 802.1ad TPID 0x88a8 presented in the NNI packet. The format may be set when vlan-tag-value is not 'none'. The input value can be either 0x8100 or 0x88a8

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

nni-port-name.description: The NNI port name starting with 'nni' for the flow

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

nni-port-name.description: The NNI port name starting with 'nni' for the flow

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

nni-port-name.description: The NNI port name starting with 'nni' for the flow

instance-id.description: It's to have flow NNI mode switch command for command terminal. Netconf will simply set the value as nni
It's to have flow NNI mode switch command for command terminal. Netconf will simply set the value as nni

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

nni-port-name.description: The NNI port name starting with 'nni' for the flow

vlan-tag-value.description: The VLAN ID presented on NNI port, the ID string has 1 to 4 numeric digits. The ID string can be none or 2 to 4094

vlan-tag-format.description: The 802.1q TPID 0x8100 or 802.1ad TPID 0x88a8 presented in the NNI packet. The format may be set when vlan-tag-value is not 'none'. The input value can be either 0x8100 or 0x88a8

instance-id.description: It's to have flow statistics mode switch command for command terminal. Netconf will simply set the value as statistics

statistics.description: Statistics per flow setting which can be on or off

upstream.description: Flow upstream statistics counters(rx on PON side, tx on NNI side)

downstream.description: Flow downstream statistics counters(rx on NNI side, tx on PON side)

instance-id.description: It's to have flow statistics mode switch command for command terminal. Netconf will simply set the value as statistics

statistics.description: Statistics per flow setting which can be on or off

instance-id.description: It's to have flow ACL mode switch command for command terminal. Netconf will simply set the value as acl
It's to have flow ACL mode switch command for command terminal. Netconf will simply set the value as acl

priority.description: ACL priority between 0 and 65535, the lower value the higher priority

action.description: ACL action which can be allow, drop or trap-to-cpu

direction.description: Subscriber traffic direction which can be either upstream or downstream

remote-ip-address.description: Subscriber remote IP address. It can be a four dotted decimal number (n.n.n.n) or any

protocol.description: Layer 4 protocol which can be tcp, udp or any(0)

remote-port.description: Subscriber remote port number in the layer 4 protocol, the port range is between 1 to 65535 or any

priority.description: ACL priority between 0 and 65535, the lower value the higher priority

action.description: ACL action which can be allow, drop or trap-to-cpu

direction.description: Subscriber traffic direction which can be either upstream or downstream

remote-ip-address.description: Subscriber remote IP address. It can be a four dotted decimal number (n.n.n.n) or any

protocol.description: Layer 4 protocol which can be tcp, udp or any(0)

remote-port.description: Subscriber remote port number in the layer 4 protocol, the port range is between 1 to 65535 or any

trap-flow-id.description: Dump the traffic from the trapped flow ID. The ID range is between 0 and 65535

trap-acl-id.description: Dump the traffic that matched the trapped ACL ID

trap-acl-direction.description: Dump the traffic that matched the trapped traffic direction which can be upstream, downstream or both directions

trap-dump-limit.description: The approximate maximum dump size between 1MB and 4000MB for the trapped traffic, by default it limits to 10MB. The dump file path is /tmp/pon_acl_trap_dump.pcap on the OLT file system

wr-size.description: Indicate the bytes of traffic packet data in written-size-unit written into the dump file. The size doesn't include PCAP file and packet headers

wr-size-unit.description: Indicate the byte unit (base 2) for the written-size

wr-packets.description: Indicate the traffic packets written into the dump file

wr-drop-packets.description: Indicate the packets unable to be written into the dump file

trap-flow-id.description: Dump the traffic from the trapped flow ID. The ID range is between 0 and 65535

trap-acl-id.description: Dump the traffic that matched the trapped ACL ID

trap-acl-direction.description: Dump the traffic that matched the trapped traffic direction which can be upstream, downstream or both directions

trap-dump-limit.description: The approximate maximum dump size between 1MB and 4000MB for the trapped traffic, by default it limits to 10MB. The dump file path is /tmp/pon_acl_trap_dump.pcap on the OLT file system

completion-status.description: Indicate flow ACL dump completion status

group-name.description: Use this attribute to configure a group of ONUs for software upgrade
Use this attribute to configure a group of ONUs for software upgrade

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

pon-port.description: PON port name starting with 'pon' on which ONU will be presented

state.description: Operational state data for ONU group

group-name.description: Use this attribute to configure a group of ONUs for software upgrade

olt-id.description: This is the logical OLT identity in the system. The OLT identity in Tibit is 0 to 63 while the identity in other system is between 0 and 65535

pon-port.description: PON port name starting with 'pon' on which ONU will be presented

config.description: Configuration data for onu group vendor

vendor-id.description: Use this attribute to configure the ONU vendor-id. e.g ALPH

active-firmware-version.description: Use this attribute to configure the ONU active-firmware version

state.description: Operational state data for onu group vendor

vendor-id.description: Use this attribute to configure the ONU vendor-id. e.g ALPH

active-firmware-version.description: Use this attribute to configure the ONU active-firmware version

state.description: Operational state data for software upgrade general-info

group-name.description: The software upgrade group used to upgrade the current ONU upgrades in progress

auto-commit.description: The software upgrade auto-commit status, if it is ON or OFF.

auto-activate.description: The software upgrade auto-activate status, if it is ON or OFF.

state.description: Operational state data for software upgrade time statistics

average.description: The software-upgrade average time in minutes

minimum.description: The software-upgrade minimum time in minutes

maximum.description: The software-upgrade maximum time in minutes

upgrade-percentage.description: The rate of in-progress, successful,failed onu upgrades

state.description: Operational state data for software upgrade percentage statistics

in-progress.description: The current in-progress upgrade percentage from the total number of ONUs upgrading

success.description: The current success rate of upgrades from the total number of ONUs upgrading

failure.description: The current failure rate of upgrades from the total number of ONUs upgrading

onu-id.description: This is the logical ONU identity in the system. The ONU identity is from 0 to 4095
This is the logical ONU identity in the system. The ONU identity is from 0 to 4095

olt-id.description: Indicate the OLT ID on which the ONU is presented

progress.description: The percentage of ONU software upgrade completion

status.description: The current status of ONU software upgrade

error-reason.description: The error reason when the software upgrade failed. If no error, it will display NA.
